page.title: 10Yealmpton Social Activities
page.content: {Yealmpton W.I.}The Womens' Institute has been in Yealmpton for 60 years. Meetings are held the first Monday in the month in the evening. {Allotments & Gardeners Association} meets at 8pm on the second Monday of the month at the W.I. Hall for lectures in horticulture. The annual show is held in September, 1985 is the 10th show. {British Legion}have their monthly meeting on the second monday of the month at the Rose & Crown at 8pm. {1st & 2nd Yealmpton Brownies}meet at the school hall on Mondays and Tuesdays after school. {1st Yealmpton Guide Company}meet in the school hall on Mondays. {Whist Drives}These are held regularly on Thursday evenings at the W.I.hall.
